name: falling leaves hat
sizes_available: free version has one size, ad-free pdf has child - adult large
notes:
**falling leaves mosaic hat (knit)**

welcome fall in style with the falling [leaves mosaic hat][1]—a quick-knit project that’s perfect for cozy autumn weekends. 

using the mosaic stitch, this pattern creates a stunning two-tone design without the complexity of stranded colorwork. 

this hat is beginner-friendly, with both charts and written instructions to guide you through each stitch. 

whether you’re keeping it for yourself or gifting it, this hat is the perfect accessory for chilly days! 


  [1]: https://marlybird.com/blog/cozy-up-with-the-falling-leaves-mosaic-knit-hat-free-pattern-mosaic-tips/
